                       EntitySqlDaoWrapperFactory<EntitySqlDao> entitySqlDaoWrapperFactory,
                       InternalCallContext context)
                         throws InternalBus.EventBusException
        Description copied from interface: InternalBus
        Post an event from within a transaction. Guarantees that the event is persisted on disk from within the same transaction
        Specified by:
        postFromTransaction in interface InternalBus
        Parameters:
        event - to be posted
        entitySqlDaoWrapperFactory - a valid transactional object
